review: It works great and the set up was easy, once I could actually get the batteries into the remote. That is my only complaint, the remote is extremely difficult to open the back of to load the batteries. I finally had to google it to see a youtube video that someone posted based on their own problems getting the thing opened up. Once that was done though everything else was smooth and we are enjoying the options and versatility it gives us.

review: We were really excited to get this stick until we actually got it.  After it was plugged in and we started using it I realized the hard way how limited the shows and movies on Amazon Prime are.  In fact, I would never have paid the subscription fee for Prime if I'd done my homework.  Also, you cannot stream from your laptop with this device the way you can with Google Chromecast.  I also don't like that you have to have Hulu Plus in order to stream.  I was hoping I could just stream regular Hulu on here using my account, but I can't.  I am so utterly disappointed in this thing.
